value.name: [Muraqqa'] : 'Umar al-Waṣfī. calligrapher : Free Download, Borrow ...
value.snippet: Calligraphy, title devised by cataloger, black ink. 4 lines per sheet, fully vocalized. Upper and lower lines in Thuluth, two middle lines in elegant Naskh Hand, separate sheets, calligraphy album. It is a calligraphy album prepared for the purpose of teaching calligraphy.

value.snippet: Arabic manuscript on paper laid down on card in concertina form, 8 album pages, each with one line in bold thuluth script in black ink, and 13 lines of diagonally-written naskhi script or 4 or 5 lines of horizontally-written naskhi script, verse-markers in colours and gold, inner margins ruled in gold, inner and outer margins of marbled paper, some staining, otherwise in good condition, contemporary black morocco with gilt-stamped central medallions and borders, doublures of marbled paper ...
